channel.title: Scheduled queries not executing
channel.description:
Hi @arikfr , I'm curious about this question as well. I'm seeing this happening on our redash instance too. I'm planning on upgrading our version but in the meantime would like to get a better understanding for this behavior.
* Version: 8.0.0+b32245 (a16f551e)

item.title: Scheduled queries not executing
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Hey @etadelta222 I moved this into its own thread as it’s not really related to the 24 month old post you commented on (you’re on V8 whereas that user was on V2!).

Seems like your scheduler isn’t working. Or you don’t have workers pulling tasks off the scheduled queue.

These issues will disappear when you upgrade to V10.

Read full topic

item.title: Scheduled queries not executing

item.description:
